title: death sworn Ward skin shard lost
body: I kinda screwed my Death Sworn skin ward shard, I changed it into essence by mistake, since I can't buy it nor get the shard again via missions, is there a way to bring it back?

replies.body: I did the same exact thing! Please help us RIOT!
its bugged anyway i mean when you try to permanently unlock it it does nothing

Oops!  Maybe we can help, but we'll need to take a closer look directly to see what happened.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll find some options. See you there!
Thanks a lot! I'm about to contact support :)
Thank you! I accidentally disenchanted it, given that its such an exclusive item I was really upset, I submitted a support ticket, hopefully something can be done. :(
I disenchanted it aswell, please help us riot, it's a costly mistake and we can't get it elsewhere. I posted a ticket already and thx in advance for your help !
